VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing The Cozy Nook relative to Sky High Cafe?
SRP.A: The Cozy Nook is {below} Sky High Cafe in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Emerald Diner}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total food safety index?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {The Cozy Nook}.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index in 1978?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index in 1978 is {195.63} index.

VE.Q: What is Emerald Diner's Food Safety Index in 1977?
VE.A: Emerald Diner's food safety index in 1977 is {179.24} index.

VE.Q: What is The Golden Spoon's Food Safety Index in 1984?
VE.A: The Golden Spoon's food safety index in 1984 is {348.17} index.

VE.Q: What are the food safety index of Emerald Diner, Sky High Cafe, and The Cozy Nook in 1973?
VE.A: Emerald Diner's food safety index is {122.57} index, Sky High Cafe's food safety index is {105.54} index, The Cozy Nook's food safety index is {106.28} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Food Safety Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum food safety index is {90.63} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Food Safety Index in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum food safety index is {466.89} index.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Food Safety Index level recorded for Crimson Plate?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate reached approximately {171.39} index in {1987}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Food Safety Index level recorded for Crimson Plate?
EVJ.A: Crimson Plate's lowest recorded level is approximately {90.77} index in {1970}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Food Safety Index?
SC.A: The average total food safety index is {858.79} index.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Food Safety Index go below 642.89 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Food Safety Index fall between 786.36 and 869.14 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Food Safety Index exceed 1012.61 index? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1986, did the total Food Safety Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total food safety index between 1978 and 1986 was {larger} than between 1970 and 1978.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 1971 higher or lower than in 1972?
NC.A: The total food safety index in 1971 was {lower} than in 1972.

NC.Q: Was the total Food Safety Index in 1973 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total food safety index in 1973 was {lower} than in 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1981, did the total Food Safety Index experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total food safety index between 1972 and 1981 was {smaller} than between 1974 and 1986.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Emerald Diner} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {The Cozy Nook, Sky High Cafe, Crimson Plate, Emerald Diner, The Golden Spoon}.
